trans-unit.source: Setting up a DSC web pull server
trans-unit.target: 设置 DSC Web 请求服务器

trans-unit.source: Applies To: Windows PowerShell 4.0, Windows PowerShell 5.0
trans-unit.target: 适用于：Windows PowerShell 4.0 和 Windows PowerShell 5.0

trans-unit.source: A DSC web pull server is a web service in IIS that uses an OData interface to make DSC configuration files available to target nodes when those nodes ask for them.
trans-unit.target: DSC Web 请求服务器是 IIS 中的一项 Web 服务，当目标节点请求 DSC 配置文件时，此服务通过 OData 接口向这些节点提供它们。

trans-unit.source: Requirements for using a pull server:
trans-unit.target: 使用请求服务器的要求：

trans-unit.source: A server running:
trans-unit.target: 运行的服务器：

trans-unit.source: WMF/PowerShell 4.0 or greater
trans-unit.target: WMF/PowerShell 4.0 或更高版本

trans-unit.source: IIS server role
trans-unit.target: IIS 服务器角色

trans-unit.source: DSC Service
trans-unit.target: DSC 服务

trans-unit.source: Ideally, some means of generating a certificate, to secure credentials passed to the Local Configuration Manager (LCM) on target nodes
trans-unit.target: 理想情况下，可通过某些方式生成证书，以便保护传递给目标节点上本地配置管理器 (LCM) 的凭据

trans-unit.source: You can add the IIS server role and DSC Service with the Add Roles and Features wizard in Server Manager, or by using PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 可使用服务器管理器中的添加角色和功能向导或使用 PowerShell 来添加 IIS 服务器角色和 DSC 服务。

trans-unit.source: The sample scripts included in this topic will handle both of these steps for you as well.
trans-unit.target: 本主题中包含的示例脚本将为你提供这两种方法的步骤。

trans-unit.source: Using the xWebService resource
trans-unit.target: 使用 xWebService 资源

trans-unit.source: The easiest way to set up a web pull server is to use the xWebService resource, included in the xPSDesiredStateConfiguration module.
trans-unit.target: 设置 Web 请求服务器的最简单方法是使用包含在 xPSDesiredStateConfiguration 模块中的 xWebService 资源。

trans-unit.source: The following steps explain how to use the resource in a configuration that sets up the web service.
trans-unit.target: 下列步骤说明如何使用设置 Web 服务的配置中的资源。

trans-unit.source: Call the [Install-Module](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dn807162.aspx) cmdlet to install the **xPSDesiredStateConfiguration** module.
trans-unit.target: 调用 [Install-Module](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dn807162.aspx) 以安装 **xPSDesiredStateConfiguration** 模块。

trans-unit.source: **Note**: **Install-Module** is included in the **PowerShellGet** module, which is included in PowerShell 5.0.
trans-unit.target: **请注意**：**Install-Module** 包含在 **PowerShellGet** 模块中，后者纳入 PowerShell 5.0。

trans-unit.source: You can download the **PowerShellGet** module for PowerShell 3.0 and 4.0 at [PackageManagement PowerShell Modules Preview](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=49186).
trans-unit.target: 可在 [PackageManagement PowerShell 模块预览](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=49186)中下载适用于 PowerShell 3.0 和 4.0 的 **PowerShellGet**。

trans-unit.source: Create a self-signed certificate with the subject `"CN=PSDSCPullServerCert"` in the `CERT:\LocalMachine\MY\` store.
trans-unit.target: 使用 `CERT:\LocalMachine\MY\` 存储空间中的使用者 `"CN=PSDSCPullServerCert"` 创建自签名证书。

trans-unit.source: You can do this with the command `New-SelfSignedCertificate -CertStoreLocation 'CERT:\LocalMachine\MY' -DnsName "PSDSCPullServerCert"`.
trans-unit.target: 可通过 `New-SelfSignedCertificate -CertStoreLocation 'CERT:\LocalMachine\MY' -DnsName "PSDSCPullServerCert"` 命令完成此操作。

trans-unit.source: In the PowerShell ISE, start (F5) the following configuration script (included in the Example folder of the **xPSDesiredStateConfiguration** module as Sample_xDscWebService.ps1).
trans-unit.target: 在 PowerShell ISE 中，启动 (F5) 以下配置脚本（包含于 **xPSDesiredStateConfiguration** 模块的示例文件夹中，名为 Sample_xDscWebService.ps1）。

trans-unit.source: This script sets up the pull server and a compliance server.
trans-unit.target: 此脚本将设置请求服务器和相容服务器。

trans-unit.source: Run the configuration, passing the thumbprint of the self-signed certificate you created as the **certificateThumbPrint** parameter:
trans-unit.target: 运行此配置，将你所创建自签名证书的指纹作为 **certificateThumbPrint** 参数进行传递：

trans-unit.source: Registration Key
trans-unit.target: 注册密钥

trans-unit.source: To allow client nodes to register with the server so that they can use configuration names instead of a configuration ID, a registration key (which is a GUID known to both the server and the client node) must be placed in a file named `RegistrationKeys.txt`.
trans-unit.target: 若要允许客户端节点注册到服务器以便使用配置名称代替配置 ID，必须将注册密钥（服务器和客户端节点均已知的 GUID）置于名为 `RegistrationKeys.txt` 的文件中。

trans-unit.source: By default, the pull server created by this example expects that file to be located in `C:\Program Files\WindowsPowerShell\DscService`.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，由此示例创建的请求服务器需要该文件位于 `C:\Program Files\WindowsPowerShell\DscService` 中。

trans-unit.source: Create a text file with only one line consisting of the registration key and save it in that folder.
trans-unit.target: 创建由注册密钥组成的单行文本文件，并将其保存在该文件夹中。

trans-unit.source: **Note**: Registration keys are not supported in PowerShell 4.0.
trans-unit.target: **注意**：PowerShell 4.0 中不支持注册密钥。

trans-unit.source: Placing configurations and resources
trans-unit.target: 放置配置和资源

trans-unit.source: After the pull server setup completes, there is a new folder under `$env:PROGRAMFILES\WindowsPowerShell` named "DscService".
trans-unit.target: 请求服务器设置完成后，`$env:PROGRAMFILES\WindowsPowerShell` 之下将出现名为“DscService”的新文件夹。

trans-unit.source: In that folder, there are two folders named "Modules" and "Configuration".
trans-unit.target: 在该文件夹中，有两个分别名为“Modules”和“Configuration”的文件夹。

trans-unit.source: In the "Modules" folder, place any resources that are needed for configurations that nodes will pull from this server.
trans-unit.target: 在“Modules”文件夹中，放置节点将从此服务器请求的配置所需的任意资源。

trans-unit.source: In the "Configuration" folder, place the configuration MOF files for any configurations that are to be pulled by nodes.
trans-unit.target: 在“Configuration”文件夹中，放置将由节点请求的任意配置的配置 MOF 文件。

trans-unit.source: The names of the MOF files depend on the type of pull client.
trans-unit.target: MOF 文件的名称取决于请求客户端的类型。

trans-unit.source: The following topics describe setting up pull clients in detail:
trans-unit.target: 以下主题详细描述了如何设置请求客户端：

trans-unit.source: Setting up a DSC pull client using a configuration ID
trans-unit.target: 使用配置 ID 设置 DSC 请求客户端

trans-unit.source: Setting up a DSC pull client using configuration names
trans-unit.target: 使用配置名称设置 DSC 请求客户端

trans-unit.source: Partial configurations
trans-unit.target: 部分配置

trans-unit.source: Creating the MOF checksum
trans-unit.target: 创建 MOF 校验和

trans-unit.source: A configuration MOF file needs to be paired with a checksum file so that an LCM on a target node can validate the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 配置 MOF 文件需要与校验和文件配对，以使目标节点上的 LCM 可以验证配置。

trans-unit.source: To create a checksum, call the [New-DSCCheckSum](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dn521622.aspx) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建校验和，请调用 [New-DSCCheckSum](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dn521622.aspx) cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet takes a **Path** parameter that specifies the folder where the configuration MOF is located.
trans-unit.target: 该 cmdlet 将接受 **Path** 参数，该参数指定了配置 MOF 所在的文件夹。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet creates a checksum file named `ConfigurationMOFName.mof.checksum`, where `ConfigurationMOFName` is the name of the configuration mof file.
trans-unit.target: 该 cmdlet 将创建名为 `ConfigurationMOFName.mof.checksum` 的校验和文件，其中 `ConfigurationMOFName` 是配置 mof 文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: If there are more than one configuration MOF files in the specified folder, a checksum is created for each configuration in the folder.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定文件夹中存在多个配置 MOF 文件，则将为该文件夹中的每个配置分别创建校验和。

trans-unit.source: The checksum file must be present in the same directory as the configuration MOF file (`$env:PROGRAMFILES\WindowsPowerShell\DscService\Configuration` by default), and have the same name with the `.checksum` extension appended.
trans-unit.target: 校验和文件与配置 MOF 文件必须位于同一目录中（默认为 `$env:PROGRAMFILES\WindowsPowerShell\DscService\Configuration`）且具有相同名称（校验文件附加有 `.checksum` 扩展名）。

trans-unit.source: **Note**: If you change the configuration MOF file in any way, you must also recreate the checksum file.
trans-unit.target: **注意**：如果以任何方式更改配置 MOF 文件，则还必须重新创建校验和文件。

trans-unit.source: See also
trans-unit.target: 另请参阅

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell Desired State Configuration Overview
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell Desired State Configuration 概述

trans-unit.target: 执行配置

trans-unit.target: 如何从 DSC 请求服务器检索节点信息
